childElements.name: NZCDCHESRS__IROU1D49
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "IRO-1-49 Description of the processes to identify and assess material impacts, risks and opportunities - The undertaking shall disclose its processes to identify its impacts, risks and opportunities and to assess which ones are material.", "showInputWidth" : false, "inputWidth" : 12, "required" : false, "repeat" : false, "repeatClone" : false, "repeatLimit" : null, "readOnly" : false, "defaultValue" : "Our organization conducted the stakeholder consultation piece of the Double Materiality Assessment using Net Zero Cloud’s Materiality Assessment Framework. ESG Stakeholders from various roles (both internal and external to our organization) were identified. These stakeholders were grouped into logical Stakeholder Categories. Each Stakeholder Category was assigned a weighting percentage, representing the relative importance of this category’s input. Individual Stakeholders were also assigned weighting percentages, representing the relative importance of the stakeholder’s individual input. Stakeholders filled out a survey of numeric-response questions on a fixed scale. Two questions were provided for each potentially material ESG Topic - one to measure the topic’s financial materiality to the organization, and a second to measure the organization’s potential to impact the topic for society and the environment.", "help" : true, "helpText" : "IRO-1-49 Description of the processes to identify and assess material impacts, risks and opportunities - The undertaking shall disclose its processes to identify its impacts, risks and opportunities and to assess which ones are material.", "pattern" : "", "ptrnErrText" : "", "minLength" : 0, "maxLength" : 5000, "placeholder" : "", "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "accessibleInFutureSteps" : false, "debounceValue" : 0, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "hide" : false, "disOnTplt" : false, "helpTextPos" : "top-right" }
